server¶

server.controllers.trajet_controller.add_trajet(data)¶

Handles the addition of a new trip.

Parameters:

data (dict) – Trip data, including: - conducteur_id (driver’s ID) - depart (departure location) - arrivee (arrival location) - date_heure (date and time) - prix (price) - places_disponibles (available seats)

Returns:

A response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

Return type:

dict

server.controllers.trajet_controller.delete_trajet(trajet_id)¶

Deletes a trip by its ID.

Parameters:

trajet_id (int) – The ID of the trip to be deleted.

Returns:

A response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

Return type:

dict

server.controllers.trajet_controller.list_trajets()¶

Retrieves all available trips.

Returns:

A response containing the list of trips or an error.

Return type:

dict

server.controllers.trajet_controller.search_trajets(filters)¶

Searches for trips based on specific criteria.

Parameters:

filters (dict) – Search criteria, including: - depart (optional) - arrivee (optional) - date_heure (optional)

Returns:

A response containing matching trips or an error.

Return type:

dict

register_user(data)¶

Handles user registration.

Parameters:

data (dict) – User data, including: - nom (last name) - prenom (first name) - email - mot_de_passe (password) - adresse (address) - coordonnees_gps (GPS coordinates) - places_voiture (number of car seats) - cv_fiscaux (number of tax documents) - indisponibilites (unavailability dates) - emploi_du_temps (schedule)

Returns:

A response indicating the success or failure of the operation.

Return type:

dict

class server.models.trajet.TrajetModel(conn)¶

Class to manage trips in the database.

create_trajet(trajet_data)¶

Creates a new trip in the database.

Parameters:

trajet_data (dict) – Data for the new trip, including: - conducteur_id: ID of the driver. - depart: Departure location. - arrivee: Arrival location. - date_heure: Date and time of departure. - prix: Price of the trip. - places_disponibles: Available seats.

Returns:

ID of the newly created trip.

Return type:

int

delete_trajet(trajet_id)¶

Deletes a trip by its ID.

Parameters:

trajet_id (int) – The ID of the trip to delete.

Returns:

True if the deletion was successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

get_all_trajets()¶

Retrieves all trips from the database.

Returns:

List of trips, each containing:

  • trajet_id (int): Trip ID.

  • conducteur_id (int): Driver ID.

  • depart (str): Departure address.

  • arrivee (str): Arrival address.

  • date_heure (str): Departure date and time.

  • prix (float): Ticket price.

  • places_disponibles (int): Number of available seats.

  • etat (str): Trip status (e.g., “en attente”, “en cours”, “terminé”).

Return type:

List[dict]

search_trajets(filters)¶

Searches for trips based on certain filters.

Parameters:

filters (dict) – Search criteria, including: - depart: Departure location. - arrivee: Arrival location.

Returns:

List of matching trips.

Return type:

List[dict]

class server.models.user.UserModel(conn)¶

Model for managing users in the database.

create_user(user_data)¶

Adds a user to the database.

Parameters:

user_data (dict) – User data including: - nom: Last name. - prenom: First name. - email: Email address. - mot_de_passe: Password. -addresse: Address. -coordonnees_gps: GPS coordinates. -places_voiture: Number of car seats. - cv_fiscaux: Number of tax documents. - indisponibilite: Days of unavailability. - emploi_du_temps: Schedule.

Returns:

The ID of the added user. False: If an error occurs during insertion. None: If no user is added.

Return type:

int

Deletes a user by their ID.

Parameters:

user_id (int) – The ID of the user to delete.

Returns:

True if the deletion is successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

class server.utils.database.BaseDonnees(host='192.168.156.221', user='rsissako', password='Fatou7151@', database='covoiturage')¶

Classe pour gérer la connexion à la base de données MySQL et effectuer des opérations telles que la création de tables, la suppression conditionnelle des tables existantes, et la fermeture de connexion.

Ferme la connexion à la base de données MySQL.
